name: ANTHOLOGY — The way of open source with Matthew Sanabria, Nithya Ruff & Jordan Harband at ATO 2023 (Changelog Interviews #563)
summary: This week we’re taking you to the hallway track of All Things Open 2023 in Raleigh, NC. Today’s episode features: Matthew Sanabria (former Engineer at HashiCorp working on Terraform Enterprise), Nithya Ruff (Chief Open Source Officer and Head of the Open Source Program Office at Amazon) &amp; Jordan Harband (Open Sourc...
